result.html: Ar farraige nó ar talamhAt sea or on land?
result.ponchtml: Ar farraige nó ar talaṁAt sea or on land?

result.eng: He drowned while swimming in the sea.
result.ga: Bádh é agus é ag snámh san fharraige
result.orig: Bádh é agus é ag snámh san fharraige
result.html: Bádh é agus é ag snámh san fharraigeHe drowned while swimming in the sea.
result.ponchtml: Báḋ é agus é ag snáṁ san ḟarraigeHe drowned while swimming in the sea.

result.eng: The house is near the sea.
result.ga: Tá an teach cóngarach don fharraige
result.orig: Tá an teach cóngarach don fharraige
result.html: Tá an teach cóngarach don fharraigeThe house is near the sea.
result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ cóngaraċ don ḟarraigeThe house is near the sea.

result.eng: The house is near the sea.
result.ga: Tá an teach in aice na farraige
result.orig: Tá an teach in aice na farraige
result.html: Tá an teach in aice na farraigeThe house is near the sea.
result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ in aice na farraigeThe house is near the sea.

result.eng: The house is three yards from the sea.
result.ga: Tá an teach trí slat ón fharraige
result.orig: Tá an teach trí slat ón fharraige
result.html: Tá an teach trí slat ón fharraigeThe house is three yards from the sea.
result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ trí slat ón ḟarraigeThe house is three yards from the sea.

result.eng: We will be swimming in the sea this summer.
result.ga: Beidh muid ag snámh sa bhfarraige an samhradh seo
result.orig: Beidh muid ag snámh sa bhfarraige an samhradh seo
result.html: Beidh muid ag snámh sa bhfarraige an samhradh seoWe will be swimming in the sea this summer.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ag snáṁ sa ḃfarraige an saṁraḋ seoWe will be swimming in the sea this summer.

result.eng: I live right beside the sea.
result.ga: Tá mise i mo chónaí díreach in aice na farraige
result.orig: Tá mise i mo chónaí díreach in aice na farraige
result.html: Tá mise i mo chónaí díreach in aice na farraigeI live right beside the sea.
result.ponchtml: Tá mise i mo ċónaí díreaċ in aice na farraigeI live right beside the sea.

result.html: An dtaitníonn an fharraige leatDo you like the sea?
result.ponchtml: An dtaitníonn an ḟarraige leatDo you like the sea?

result.eng: I like the sea a lot.
result.ga: Taitníonn an fharraige thar cionn liom
result.orig: Taitníonn an fharraige thar cionn liom
result.html: Taitníonn an fharraige thar cionn liomI like the sea a lot.
result.ponchtml: Taitníonn an ḟarraige ṫar cionn liomI like the sea a lot.

result.eng: I go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ga: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh
result.orig: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh
result.html: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadhI go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ponchtml: Téim ag snáṁ sa ḃfarraige ċuile lá den ḃliain Fiú sa ġeiṁreaḋI go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?

result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí cois farraige
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí cois farraige
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí cois farraigeI live beside the sea.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí cois farraigeI live beside the sea.

result.eng: It's beside the sea but close to the city as well.
result.ga: Tá sé cois farraige ach gar don chathair freisin
result.orig: Tá sé cois farraige ach gar don chathair freisin
result.html: Tá sé cois farraige ach gar don chathair freisinIt's beside the sea but close to the city as well.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé cois farraige aċ gar don ċaṫair freisinIt's beside the sea but close to the city as well.

result.eng: The black rain clouds made the sea look gloomy and dark.
result.ga: Bhí dreach gruama dorcha ar an fharraige ag na néalta dubha fearthainne
result.orig: Bhí dreach gruama dorcha ar an fharraige ag na néalta dubha fearthainne
result.html: Bhí dreach gruama dorcha ar an fharraige ag na néalta dubha fearthainneThe black rain clouds made the sea look gloomy and dark.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dreaċ gruama dorċa ar an ḟarraige ag na néalta duḃa fearṫainneThe black rain clouds made the sea look gloomy and dark.

result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ga: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.orig: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.html: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ponchtml: Inseoiḋ mise do m'aṫair air é aċ é a ṫeaċt ón ḟarraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.

result.eng: They would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ga: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.orig: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.html: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ponchtml: Is minic a ẛuíoḋ siad ina mbeirt ar ḃruaċ na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
